1.「よう！ お前も 四天の星巡りの挑戦者か？: Hey! Are you one of the Four Heavenly Trials|challengers?

2.「……アンタが 英雄だって？| ボーっとしたツラしちゃって| さえないヤツだねぇ: You're a hero? You're a dopey, dopey, dopey|little guy...

3.「まぁ そう言うなよ！| コイツ ボンヤリしてるようで じつは| むちゃくちゃ: Well, don't say that! He seems to be a bit of|a spear, but he might actually be really|strong, you know?

4.「でも お前 運がいいぜ。| アストルティア史上 いちばんの大英雄である| オレ: But you're lucky. You got to meet us, the|greatest heroes in the history of Astoltia!

5.「ほらほら！ もっと喜べよ！| どうしてもって言うなら| 握手くらいなら してや: Come on, come on! You should be more happy! If|you insist, I could at least shake your hand!

6.「……兄ちゃん 兄ちゃん。| このヒト ボクたちのこと| 全然 知らないみたいだ: Big brother, big brother... He doesn't seem to|know anything about us...

7.「な 何ィーーーーーーーーーーッ！！？| お前 オレたちのこと 知らねえのか！？: What the hell? Don't you know about us?

8.「……ハハッ！ しかたねえなぁ～。| 同じ英雄の よしみで| 特別に 名乗ってや: ...Ha ha! I can't help it~. I'll give you a|special name for the same hero, Yoshimi...

9.「我ら ドワチャッカ大陸に羽ばたきし| 自由の翼！: We, the Wings of Liberty, who flapped our|wings over Dwachakka Continent!

10.「山神イプチャルの加護を受け| 大陸にはびこる 魔物を打ち倒し……| 民を 救い: With the blessing of Yppchal, the mountain|god, you will defeat the monsters that infest|the continent and save your people!

11.「ドワチャッカ大陸を開拓せし 大英雄……っ！| その名は……: The great hero who pioneered Dwachakka|Continent...! His name is...

13.「震天の槌！ ナンナ！: The Hammer of the Shaken Hea[...]

16.「……ってなワケだ。| カルサドラ火山にある オレたちの像| 見たことくらいは: That's why. You've probably seen the statue of|us at Calsadora Volcano, right?

17.「天使に聞いたんだが オレたちが 死んだあと| とびきり でっかいのが 建てられ: The angel told me that after we died, they|built the biggest one they could find. Thank|God for that!

18.「そうだ。お前のことを 聞いてなかったな。| どんな英雄なんだ？: That's right. You never told me about you.|What kind of hero?

19.「勇者の盟友だと！？| 始まりの大魔王 ゴダを撃退した| あの勇者の盟友なのか！: Ally of Hero! You're an ally of that Hero who|defeated Goda, the Great Demon King of the|Beginning! What's your name?

20.「……なーんだ。違うのか。| 勇者と盟友って 何組もいたんだな。| ま！ よろし: ...Nah. So it's different. Hero and his|allies... There were many pairs... Well! Nice|to meet you <pc>!

21.「見ろよ……あの神殿を。| あの荘厳な神殿で 試練とやらが| おこなわれるに 違: Look at that temple. I bet there will be|trials in that majestic temple.

23.「お 黄金の試練だっけ……。| どんな試練 なのかな？: Oh, the golden trial... what kind of trial is|it?

24.「なんてったって 黄金の試練だぜ。| 立ちふさがる強敵……未知への大冒険！| 最: After all, it's the Golden Trial. A great|adventure into the unknown! And who knows what|treasures await you in the end!

25.「だが！ 何が待ち受けていようと| オレたち三闘士なら 楽勝さ！| 英雄のチカラ: But! No matter what's in store for us, we|Triads can handle it! Let's show them what|heroes are made of!

26.「よぉし！ これより あの神殿に突撃する！| 気合入れて いくぞッ！: Yes! We're going to hit that temple! Let's go,|let's go, let's go!

28.「おーーーいッ！| 何 ボーッとしてんだーー！？: Hey! What are you staring at?

29.「お前も 試練受けるんだろ！？| 早くしねえと おいてくぞーーー！！: You're going through the trials too, right?|Hurry up or I'll leave you!

32.「……いらっしゃいませっ！| ほしいものが あれば| なんでも おっしゃってくだ: Welcome! If there is anything you want, please|let us know.

33.「い いらっしゃいませ……？| 未知への大冒険……は？: Welcome, welcome...? What's your big adventure|into the unknown...?

35.「ここは……？| 私 どうして こんなところにいるのかしら。: Is this...? Why am I in a place like this?

36.「俺は……教会に いたはずだ。| 願いを 聞きとどけてもらおうと| 神に 祈りを: I was in Church. Say a Prayer to God to hear|my request.

37.「あなたは……もしや 天使様か！？| ついに ワシにも お迎えがきたのか……ッ！: Are you... an angel? Have you come for me at|last?

38.「なんだ コイツら？| どこから わいて出やがった！: What the hell is wrong with them? Where the|hell did they come from?

39.「ようこそ アストルティアの民よ。| あなたたちの願いを かなえてくれる品々を|: Welcome, people of Astoltia. Here you will|find the goods that will fulfill your wishes.

40.「天星の果実ですね？| お買い上げ ありがとうございます！| これで あなたの願: Celestial star fruit, right? Thank you for|your purchase! Now your wish will come true.

41.「ここ お店みたいに 見えるけど……。| もしかして ボクたち 試練の場所| 間: This place looks like a store... but maybe|we're in the wrong place for trials...?

42.「なぁ 兄者！ どうするんだい？: Hey, brother! What are you doing?

43.「願いを かなえてくれる品だって……！| じゃあ キレーなオネーチャンたちに|:
They said it's a wish-granting product. Then|maybe there's some kind of potion that will|make all the pretty ladies fall in love with|
|you!

45.「失礼しました。あなたたちは| 四天の星巡りの 挑戦者だったのですね。| では: My apologies. You were the challengers for the|Four Heavenly Trials. Well, let's say hello|again...

46.「僕は クリュトス。| 黄金の試練の 審判の天使であり| この祈願の神殿を 管理: I am Krutos. I am the Angel of Judgement of|the Golden Trials and the custodian of this|Prayer Temple.

48.「ここは 太古の昔より アストルティアから| 訪れし者に 奇跡を与える場……|:
This is a place where, since time immemorial,|miracles have been granted to those who came|from Astoltia... a temple where people's|
|wishes are fulfilled.

49.「さっきのヤツら| アストルティアから 来てたのかい！？| でも いったい どう: Those guys just now came from Astoltia? But|how in the world did they get there?

50.「彼らは 心から かなえたい願いを抱えて| ここへ導かれた。ヒトの強固なる想いは:
They were led here with a heartfelt wish to be|fulfilled. The strong desire of human beings|can even work miracles that lead them to|
|heaven.

51.「ご心配なく。| 彼らは無事に アストルティアへと 帰ります。| もっとも ここ: Don't worry. They will return safely to|Astoltia. Although they don't remember coming|here.

52.「僕は 彼らの願いをかなえる アイテムを与え| 対価として 彼らのもつ 感謝のエ: I give them an Item that fulfills their|wishes, and in return, I am allowed to collect|their Gratitude Energy.

54.「アストルティアの人々が生み出す| 感謝の気持ちには 計り知れないほどの| エネ: The Gratitude Energy generated by the people|of Astoltia is immeasurable.

55.「ヒトが生きるのに 火や水を使うのと同じように| 僕ら天使は 人々からの感謝のエ: Just as humans use fire and water to survive,|we angels use the Gratitude Energy of people|to help us live in Heaven.

56.「僕は 天星郷に住む天使たちの生活を| 支えるために この祈願の神殿で| 感謝の: I collect Gratitude Energy in this Prayer|Temple to support the lives of the angels in|Heaven.

57.「だったら 普通に 願いをかなえて| いくらでも感謝してもらえば いいじゃないか:
If that's the case, why don't you just make|wishes come true and have people thank you as|much as you want? You don't have to go to the|
|trouble of opening a store lik[...]

58.「残念ながら 彼らから 感謝のエネルギーを| 直接回収するのは とても非効率なん:
Unfortunately, it's very inefficient to|recover Gratitude Energy directly from them.|We can only recover a fraction of it that|
|way...

59.「しかし 研究の結果 僕は突きとめました。| 人々が使用する貨幣……ゴールドには:
But after much research, I have discovered|that the money that people use...gold...tends|to contain the energy of gratitude! The money|
|that people use... gold... tends to contain[...]

60.「……というワケで エネルギーを 効率的に| 回収するために この神殿で アイテ: So, in order to recover energy efficiently,|they sell items in this temple to make money.|Good idea, right?

61.「なんて言うか……天使って 変わってんだなぁ。: What can I say....heavenly beings are strange.

62.「では さっそく あなたたちに| 黄金の試練を 課しましょう……。| 試練の内容: So, let's begin the golden trial... a trial|that will test your mettle...

63.「この神殿で みなさんで協力して| １００万ゴールド 稼いでくださいっ。: Please help us earn a million gold in this|temple.

65.「ちょ ちょっと待ちなよ！| 英雄の試練なんだろ！？| どうして 商売なんか……: Hey, wait a minute! This is the trial of|heroes! Why are you in business...

66.「人々の願いをかなえ 幸福をもたらすのも| 英雄の役目です。これを 乗り越えられ: It is the role of the hero to grant wishes and|bring happiness. If you don't make it through|this, the Soul Candle will never be lit.

67.「ここで みなさんが １００万ゴールド稼ぎ| 僕が 感謝のエネルギーを回収するこ:
The trial will be completed when you have|earned one million gold and I have collected|my Gratitude Energy. No objections will be|
|accepted.

68.「ガーーッハッハッハ！ 面白いじゃねえか！| 商売だろうがなんだろうが やってや: Gahhhh! That's funny! Business or not, I'll do|it! Nothing is impossible for us Triads!

69.「まったく 兄者ときたら……| いつも 勝手に 決めちゃうんだから。| ま しか: You know, you always make up your mind on your|own. Well, I can't help it.

71.「アンタも ハラくくんな！| キリキリ 働いてもらうからね。| サボったりするん: You, too, Harakun! I'll have you work hard.|Don't slack off!

72.「では 具体的な 商売の手順について| もう少し くわしく お話ししましょう。|: Now, let's talk more about specific business|procedures. Please come this way.

73.「これで 母さんの病気が 治せる……。| 本当に ありがとうございます！: This will cure my mother's disease... thank|you so much!

74.「なんか なつかしいな。| こうしてると ドワチャッカ大陸での日々を| 思いだす: This is very nostalgic. This reminds me of my|days in Dwachakka Continent...

75.「お前 オレたちが どういう英雄なのか| 知らないって 言ってたな。| 思い出話: You said you didn't know what kind of heroes|we were. I'll tell you what we are, just for|the sake of reminiscing.

76.「この時代から ４０００年ほど前……| あの頃の ドワチャッカ大陸は およそ|:
About 4,000 years ago... back then, the|Dwachakka Continent was not a land fit for|human habitation. The Dwachatka continent at|
|that time was not a land fit for hu[...]

77.「凶悪な魔物たちに支配され 大地は荒れ果て……| オレたち ドワーフは 山奥や岩: The land was desolate, ruled by vicious|monsters, and we Dwarfs lived a miserable life|hiding in the mountains and rocky caves.

78.「外に出れば 魔物に殺される。| だけど 穴の中には ロクに食べ物なんてなく|: If they went outside, they would be killed by|monsters. But there was no food in the pit, so|we had to starve to death. It was hell.

79.「子供のころから 毎日ずっと| 外には 恐ろしい魔物が たくさんいるから| 出ち: Ever since I was a child, I was told every day|that I shouldn't go outside because there were|so many horrible monsters out there.

80.「大人も子供も 暗い顔をしてて……| みんな 生きることを あきらめてしまってた: Adults and children alike had dark faces...|everyone had given up on life.

81.「……だが。オレは 穴ぐらの中で| 一生を終えることなんて 耐えられなかった。: But... I couldn't bear to spend the rest of my|life in a cellar.

82.「なぜ オレたちは こんな目に| あわなきゃならない？ 暗い穴の中で| 死を待つ: Why do we have to go through this? To hell|with living our lives in a dark hole, waiting|to die!

83.「オレは 毎日 自由を夢見ていた。| 輝く太陽の下に 飛び出したかった。: I dreamed of freedom every day. I wanted to|fly out into the shining sun.

84.「だから 兄弟分のナンナとドルタムを連れて| 命がけの旅に 出たのさ。| オレた: That's why I took my brothers, Nanna and|Doltam, on a deadly journey. To take|possession of the world we live in.

85.「あのときも 兄者が 強引に決めちゃってさ。| 毎日のように 魔物と戦うハメにな: My brother had forced my hand at that time|too. We had to fight monsters every day.

86.「魔物は とっても強くて| 何度も 死にそうになったけど……| ３人でチカラを合: The monster was very strong, and we almost|died many times, but... the three of us pulled|together and survived.

87.「そしたらね。ボクらの戦いを見た| ドワーフのみんなが 穴の中から出てきて| 協: Then, you know. When the Dwarves saw us|fighting, they came out of their holes and|started to cooperate with us.

88.「アタシたちについてくる者 宿を貸してくれる者| ……たくさんのドワーフたちが|: Many Dwarfs supported us on our journey, some|to follow us, some to rent us accommodation...

89.「アタシたちが 魔物を倒して| 住めそうな土地を 切り拓いて……: I'm going to help you defeat the monsters and|carve out a nice piece of land for you to l[...]

90.「みんなで協力して クワで土地を耕して| 家を建てて。少しずつ 少しずつ 地上に:
We worked together, plowing the land with Kuwa|and building houses. Little by little, we|built more and more Dwarf settlements on the|
|ground.

91.「最終的には 数えきれないほどのドワーフが| アタシたちに ついてきちゃってさ。: In the end, countless Dwarves followed us. It|became a huge caravan.

92.「大陸を巡り 魔物どもを倒し続け……| 何年もかけて オレたちは ついに| 大陸: After years of traveling around the continent|and defeating monsters, we finally made it|from one end of the continent to the other.

93.「あの日の アイツらの顔| 今でも 忘れられないぜ……。: I'll never forget their faces that day...

94.「やっと 自由と平和を 手に入れて| 喜びで 顔が キラキラ輝いてるんだ。| さ: My face is glowing with the joy of finally|having freedom and peace in my life. Just like|the guests that just walked in.

95.「オレたちは すでに死んじまった身ではあるが| アイツらの……ドワチャッカ大陸の: Although we are already dead, we want to|protect the smiles and happiness of the people|of Dwachakka Continent.

96.「それが オレの新しい夢だ。| そのためのチカラを 手に入れるために| オレたち: That is my new dream. To obtain the power to|do so, we took on the challenge of Four|Heavenly Trials.

97.「……そういや お前は？| 偉大なるチカラを 手に入れたら| 何をするつもりなん: Well, what about you? What are you going to do|when you receive your great power?

98.「悪い！ 変な質問しちまった。| そんなの気軽に 話せることじゃないよな。: My bad! I asked a weird question. It's not|something you can talk about casually, is it?

99.「……よーし！ 仕事再開だ！| ここからは オレかナンナ| 好きな方を選んで 仕: ...Alright! Let's get back to work! From here|on out, it's you or me, Nanna, whichever you|prefer... and you're gonna help me do my job!

100.「１００万ゴールドまで 道のりは長いが| <pc>とオレたちに 不可能はない！|: It's a long way to a million gold, but with|<pc> and us, nothing is impossible!|Let's go for it!

101.「だいぶ 貯まってきたけど……| まだまだ 目標には 程遠いね。: I've saved up quite a bit, but... we're still|far from our goal.

103.「……うわーーーん！| もーヤダ！ もー飽きた！| もっと 手っ取り早く 稼げね: ...oh my god! Oh no! I'm bored! Can't you make|some money quicker?

104.「はぁ！？ 何言ってるんだい！| がんばろうって言ったの 兄者じゃないか！: Huh! What are you talking about? You're the|one who said we should do our best!

105.「もう チマチマと| キラキラ拾うの 飽きたんだよ！| 飽きた飽きた飽きた 飽ー: I'm tired of picking up glitter and sparkles|every little bit of time! I'm tired of it,|tired of it, tired of it, tired of it!

106.「……こ この バカ兄者ッ！| たるみきった根性 たたき直してやるから| そこに: You stupid brother! I'll fix your sagging|guts!

107.「げげっ！？| ナ ナンナ 早まるな！| 冗談！ 冗談だってば……！！: Geez! Nanna, Nanna, don't be hasty! I'm|kidding! I'm joking...!

108.「うるさぁーーい！| バカバカバカバカ！ 大バカ兄者ぁーーーッ！！: Shut up! Stupid, stupid, stupid! Big idiot|brother!

109.「フフッ 変わらないなぁ……。| ふたりとも。: They haven't changed... both of them.

110.「気にしないでね。| ふたりのアレは いつものことだから……。: Don't worry about it. It's just the two of us|do it all the time...

111.「カブ兄ちゃんは バカ正直で| ナンナ姉ちゃんは 生真面目で……| どっちも真っ: Kabu is honest and Nanna is sincere...both of|them are straight-forward, so their opinions|clash.

112.「でも ああやって ぶつかることができるのは| ふたりが 本当に仲良しな 証拠な: But the fact that we can clash like that is|proof that we are really good friends. The|more they fight, the better...

113.「……ボクね。また こうやって| ３人 一緒に 過ごすことができて| とても う: It's me...you know. I'm so happy that the|three of us can spend time together like this|again.

114.「ドワチャッカ大陸を踏破した後| ボクたちは ３つの大集落を作って| それぞれの: After we had conquered the Dwachakka|Continent, we created three large settlements|and became the chiefs of each...

115.「みんな 離ればなれになって……| 長のつとめが忙しくて なかなか| 会う機会も: We've all been separated, and I've been so|busy with my duties as head that I haven't|been able to make time to see them.

116.「それまで ずっと一緒に冒険してたのに| ふたりに会えなくなって| すごく……さ: We had been adventuring together for so long,|and I missed you both so much... so much...

117.「ドルタム！ 何 辛気くさい顔してんだよ！| 困ったことが あったら いつだって: Doltam! What's that sour look on your face?|Didn't I tell you to tell your brother|whenever you had a problem?

118.「兄者が しっかりしないから| ドルタムだって 困ってるんだろ！| まったく……: Doltam's in trouble because you won't pull|yourself together! You know...

119.「……ううん なんでもないよ| 兄ちゃん 姉ちゃん。| 心配してくれて ありがと: No, it's nothing, bro... it's nothing, sis.|Thanks for worrying about me.

120.「でも……確かに なかなか| お金が貯まらないのは 困ったね。| 何か いい方法: But...it sure is a problem that it's hard to|save money. Is there any good way...?

122.「……いらっしゃいませ！| 何かご入り用ですか？ 願いをかなえる品々を| なんで: ...Welcome! Can I help you? We have everything|you need to make your wishes come true!

123.「なんでも 願いをかなえてくださる？: Will you grant me anything I wish?

124.「なんと すばらしいのでしょう！| わたくし どうしても| 手に入れてほしいもの: How wonderful! There's something I really want|you to get for me!

125.「できる限りの お代を | お支払いさせていただきますわ。| わたくしの願いを: I will pay you as much as I can. Grant me my|wish!

126.「おいコラァッ！| それはオレたちの金だ！ 返しやがれ！！: Hey, hey, hey! That's our money! Give it back!

127.「この世の金は すべて我のもの……。| 憎き金持ちどもに 渡してなるものか……。: All the money in the world is mine and I will|not give it to the rich and hateful...

128.「我は この金を使い……今度こそ……。: I will use this money... this time...

130.「ハハン 弱っちいねぇ……。| アタシと戦おうなんて| １０００年早いよ！ 出直: Hahan, you weakling... you're a thousand years|too young to fight me! Come back!

131.「ガーッハッハ！ ドワチャッカ大陸の| 魔物どもを 一掃したんだ。| これくらい: Gah! We wiped out all the monsters in|Dwachakka Continent. This is nothing!

132.「ここまで お前を見てて| その実力は 理解してるさ。| へへっ 信じてるぜ！: I've been watching you for a while now and I|know what you're capable of. I believe in|you! Sibling!

133.「も もう一度 １００万……。| あんなに 大変だったのに……。: One more million... after all we've been|through...

134.「すまねぇ……みんな。| オレのワガママに 付きあわせたせいで| こんなことに…: I'm sorry... everyone. I'm sorry you had to go|along with my selfishness...

136.「ウハハハハハハッ！| ボロ儲けだーーーーっ！| 笑いが 止まんねえーーーっ！！: Hahahahahahahaha! I'm gonna make a fortune! I|can't stop laughing!

137.「調子にのっちゃって もう……。| 兄者の金じゃないんだからね。: I'm getting carried away... It's not my|brother's money anymore.

138.「おいおい クリュトスさんよぉ～。| 約束通り １００万ゴールド 稼いだぜ！|: Hey, hey, hey, Mr. Krutos! I earned a million|gold as promised! Now I've passed the test|without any complaints, right?

145.「う 売り上げ金 全部 持ってかれちまった。| こういう場合 試練ってどうなるん: I've lost all the money I made from the sale.|What about trials in a case like this?

146.「僕が １００万ゴールド分の| 感謝のエネルギーを回収することで| 試練は完了す: I told you that the trial would be completed|when I collect my one million gold worth of|Gratitude Energy.

147.「こうして エネルギーを回収する前に | 売り上げ金が 奪われてしまった以上|: And since the proceeds were taken before the|energy could be recouped, we can only conclude|that the trial is ongoing.

149.「ふんがーーーーッ！！| あのガイコツ野郎 ナメた真似しやがって！！| 落とし前: FUCK! That little fucker didn't take me for a|fool! I'm gonna pay for this!

150.「<pc>！ お前だって| 汗水たらして 稼いだ金を奪われて| 腹が立つだろ！？: <pc>! You'd be pissed off, too, if|they took your hard-earned, sweat equity away|from you!<yesno><close>

151.「くぅ～～～～っ！| お前ってヤツは どこまで お人好しなんだよ！| だが オレ: Koo ～～～～! You're such a softy! But I'll never|forgive him!

152.「やっぱり お前だって そう思うよな！: I knew you'd think so, too!

153.「やられたら やり返す！| オレたちの金を 取り戻しに行くぞ！！: You get beat up, we'll beat you back! We're|gonna get our money back!

154.「感謝のエネルギーを 悪用されれば| ここだけではなく 天星郷全体に| 被害がお: If the Gratitude Energy were to be abused,|there is a danger that it would not only|affect this place, but all of Heaven.

155.「あの者……厄魔ポヴァディウスを| 逃がすわけには いきません。: We cannot let that man, Evil Povadius, escape.

156.「この黄金の試練場から 悪しきものが出ないよう| 見えない結界を張りました。これ: We have set up an invisible barrier to keep|the evil one out of this Golden Trials. This|should have kept him inside the trials.

This evil presence that has moved to the west|of the trial site...it appears to have taken|refuge in the old temple that used to be used|
|before they built this place.

158.「古い神殿は 西にあるファボル鉱山の中です。| あなたたちの 試練の達成のために: The old temple is in the Fabol Mine to the|west. Please go and retrieve the Safe for the|accomplishment of your trials.

159.「よーし！| 英雄様を怒らせたら どうなるか……| あの野郎に しっかり教えてや: All right! Let's give that son of a bitch a|good lesson in what happens when you piss off|a hero!

160.「ククク……集まったぞ。アストルティア中の| 金持ちどもから 奪ってきた金……。: Kukkuk... here we are. All the gold I've|robbed from the richest men and women in|Astoltia... all of it, all of it, is mine...

162.「まただ！ なぜ……我は こんな目に……！！: Again! Why did this happen to me?

163.「なんだぁ アイツ……| 金に触れることが できないのか？| それなら なんで: What, he can't touch the money? Then why is he|stealing...

164.「やいやいやいッ！| この 売り上げドロボー！！| オレたちの金を とっとと 返: No, no, no! You fucking sales slacker! Give us|back our money!

165.「オォォオ……ッ！| 我の邪魔を するなぁぁぁ……！！: ohohoh...! Don't get in my way...!

166.「危なかった……！ ケガはない？: That was close...! Are you hurt?

168.「なぜ 我は こんな呪いを……。| 貴様ら金持ちなど 許さぬ……許さぬぞぉ……！: Why did I have to curse you rich people, I|will not forgive you.

170.「……とはいえ これじゃ キリがねえな。: But this is just the beginning.

171.「<cs_pchero>！| オレたちが ザコどもを 食い止める！| その間に: <cs_pchero>! We'll hold them off! And while|we're at it, you take down that little guy!

172.「よっしゃ！ 金庫を取り戻したぜ！| 中身も無事のようだし これで試練は合格だ！: Yeah! We got the Safe back! The contents|appear to be intact, so we've passed the|trials!

173.「そ そんな……。| まだ 立ち上がってくるなんて……。: I can't believe he's still getting up.

174.「上等だ！ そっちが その気なら| 何度だって たたきつぶしてやるよッ！！: I'll do it! If you're so determined, I'll|crush it as many times as I want!

175.「金持ちも……神も 天使も 許さない。| なぜ 我にこのような むごい運命を|: I will not forgive the rich, nor God, nor the|angels. Why did you make me suffer such a|terrible fate?

177.「どうも オレには お前が しんどい運命に| 苦しんでいるようにしか 見えないん: I can't help but think you're suffering a hard|fate. I don't think it's the money you want.

178.「どうして こんな 理不尽な目に| あわなくちゃならない……。| オレも 穴ぐら: Why do I have to go through such unreasonable|things... I thought that every day in my|cellar too.

179.「だから お前の気持ちが よくわかる。| お前は 怒りで 本当にほしいものを|: So I know exactly how you feel. You're just so|angry that you've lost sight of what you|really want.

180.「本当の願いは なんだ？ 言ってみろ。| オレたちが お前の願いを かなえてやる: What is your true wish? Tell us. We'll grant|your wish!

181.「……我の話を 聞いてくれるというのか？: You expect me to listen to you?

182.「ア……俺 俺だって……こんな風に| なりたかったわけじゃない。| 貧しさから: I didn't want to be like this. I just wanted|to escape poverty...

183.「俺は……かつて ただの人間だった。| 貧乏な家に生まれ その日の食いぶちにも|: I was once just a human being. I was born into|a poor family... and I lived every day without|enough to eat.

184.「どんなに真面目に働いても それは変わらない。| 親が作った １００万ゴールドの:
No matter how diligently I work, that will|never change. I can't even pay back the|million gold debt my parents made me. I'm in|
|the doldrums...

185.「俺に こんな運命を背負わせた 神が憎い。| 俺たちの犠牲の上に立っている 金持:
I hate God for making me suffer this fate. I|hate the rich people who are standing on our|sacrifice. That's all I thought about every|
|day.

186.「その日……俺は ついに 盗みを働いた。| とある富豪が 秘蔵していた古いメダル:
That day... I finally stole. It was an old|medal that a certain wealthy man had kept in|his treasured possession. That medal... had a|
|Demon in it.

187.「俺のような 盗みを働く愚か者を| そいつは ずっと待っていたのだろう。| 悪魔: I guess he's been waiting for a thief like me|for a long time. When the Demon appeared|before me, he said

188.「ケケ……。哀れな男……。| オレが お前の借金を肩代わりしてやろう。| 金持ち: Keke... poor man... I'll take care of your|debt. I'll even give you the power to take|revenge on the rich.

189.「その代わり……| お前の魂を オレに よこしな。| それで お前の願いは かな: In exchange... give me your soul. Then your|wish will be granted.

190.「俺は 悪魔の誘惑に 抗うことができず| ヤツに 魂を売り渡した……。| そうし: I couldn't resist the Demon's temptation to|sell my soul to him... and that's how I|received this power.

191.「だが 悪魔は やはり悪魔だ。ヤツは| 俺に 永遠に続く金への渇望と 金に触れる: But the Demon is still the Demon. He left me|with an everlasting thirst for gold and a|curse that says I will decay if I touch it...

192.「どんなに 金を奪っても 触れることはできず| この渇望と苦しみから 逃れるすべ: No matter how much money you take, you cannot|touch it, and there is no escape from this|craving and suffering...

193.「心の奥底にあった願いに 導かれたのか 俺は| 他のヤツと同じように あの神殿へ: Perhaps guided by a wish deep in my heart, I|drifted to that temple like the others. Please|put an end to this hell...

196.「コイツが ポヴァディウスに| 呪いをかけた 悪魔か……！| ヘドが出そうなほど: So this is the Demon who put the curse on|Povadius...! He's a heinous prick.

197.「永遠に逃れることのできない 地獄の中で| 苦しみ続けなければ ならないなんて…: I can't help but wonder if there's anything I|can do to help them continue to suffer in a|hell from which they can never escape...

228.「ゴーレック様ほどの 尽きせぬ願望を持つ者は| アストルティアの歴史を さかのぼ: Few people in the history of Astoltia have|such an insatiable desire as Mr. Golek...

244.「審判の天使クリュトスの名において| あなたたちの 黄金の試練の合格を| ここに: In the name of Krutos, the Angel of Judgement,|I hereby declare that you have passed your|golden trial. Thank you for your hard work.

245.「それから……こちらを。| 試練を達成した あなたたちへ| 僕からの お祝いです: And now... this. My congratulations to those|of you who made it through the trials.

248.「一時は どうなることかと思ったけど| 無事 試練を突破できて よかったな！: For a while there, I wasn't sure what was|going to happen, but I'm glad you made it|through the trials!

253.「ガッハッハ！ 残念 フラれちまったぜ！| だが その気になったら いつでも言え: Gah! Too bad I got dumped! But whenever you're|ready, you just let me know! You're more than|welcome!

254.「よっしゃ！ お前なら 大歓迎だぜ！| じゃ 一緒に 次の試練に行くとするか！: Yes! You're more than welcome! Well, I guess|we're off to the next trial together!

255.「……って これから オレたちが挑戦する| 白灰の試練は もう合格済みなのか。|: So the trial we're about to take on has|already been passed? I'm sorry to say goodbye|for now.
